name: A Humans Guide for Dummies: Mornings
name_original: A Humans Guide for Dummies: Mornings
description:
“Greetings, fellow Human being!

Ever struggle to get up in the morning? Tired of waking up late for those oh-so-important meetings?

Then boy-howdy do I have the perfect guide for you!

The “A Humans Guide for Dummies: Mornings” guide should get you right on your way! Just take a gander, extract that important knowledge and store it right inside your prefrontal cortex for future reference. We here at Human Guides© Cherish your development, and hope that our extensive knowledge will help you in your constant struggle to exist. Thank you for your support and praise.

And remember, keep on smiling, for tomorrow may be the end! Human Guides inc.©”

 

Producers notes:

Well, for a week’s worth of work, I’m happy with this. Had to end up learning how to use CSS and twine, and managed to pull the game off, so I am incredibly happy with it :D

Still, hope y’all enjoy! I had fun writing this one ^^
